titleInfo.title: Stop Me If You've Heard This One - 1939-12-23 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: 1939-12-23 broadcast of NBC's Stop Me If You've Heard This One, part 2. Personnel include Milton Berle (host), Dan Seymour (announcer), Jackie Coogan (guest), Vincent Travers (orchestra leader), and Harry Hershfield and Jay C. Flippen as the panelist of 'gagbusters'. Sponsored by Quaker Oats.

subject.topic: Stop me if you've heard this one (Radio program)
